word: In Oakland, there was spread before me a long, lawyer-framed document, filled with technicalities, which document was a copy of the conditions under which the Sanitarium issued bonds. The provisions of this bond issue were such that money gathered in from all parts of the country is tied up in the medical institution at Battle Creek for a long period of time.--Letter 220, 1903, pp. 1, 4, 7, 11. (To David Paulson, Oct. 14, 1903.)
